div.div: <% login_so = server.eval("@SOBJECT(sthpw/login['login', $LOGIN])")[0] login = login_so.get("login") login_id = login_so.get("id") login_sk = "sthpw/login?project=admin&id=%s" %login_id title = "%s %s" %(login_so.get("first_name"), login_so.get("last_name")) company_expr = "@GET(twog/person.twog/company.name)" company = server.eval(company_expr, login_sk, single=True) or " " client_expr = "@SOBJECT(twog/person.twog/client)" client = server.eval(client_expr, login_sk, single=True) client_name = client.get('name') production_email = client.get('production_team_email') if production_email in [None,'']: production_email = 'ProductionP@2gdigital.com' scheduling_email = client.get('scheduling_team_email') if scheduling_email in [None,'']: scheduling_email = 'Scheduling@2gdigital.com' acct_mgr = client.get('account_manager') if acct_mgr in [None,'']: acct_mgr = 'Andy Hopkins' acct_mgr_fname = 'Andy' acct_mgr_email = 'andy.hopkins@2gdigital.com' acct_mgr_phone = '818.863.8900' else: acct_mgr_sob = server.eval("@SOBJECT(sthpw/login['login','%s'])" % acct_mgr)[0] acct_mgr = '%s %s' % (acct_mgr_sob.get('first_name'), acct_mgr_sob.get('last_name')) acct_mgr_fname = acct_mgr_sob.get('first_name') acct_mgr_email = acct_mgr_sob.get('email') acct_mgr_phone = acct_mgr_sob.get('phone_number') sales_person = client.get('sales_person') sales_email = 'Sales@2gdigital.com' if sales_person not in [None,'']: sales_email = server.eval("@GET(sthpw/login['login','%s'].email)" % sales_person)[0] if sales_email in [None,'']: sales_email = 'Sales@2gdigital.com' snapshot = server.get_snapshot(login_so, context='icon') snapshot_code = snapshot.get("code") path = '/context/icons/common/no_image.png' if snapshot_code: path = server.get_path_from_snapshot(snapshot_code, mode="web") else: #snapshot = server.get_snapshot(client, context='icon') #snapshot_code = snapshot.get("code") #if snapshot_code: # path = server.get_path_from_snapshot(snapshot_code, mode="web") snap_expr = "@SOBJECT(sthpw/snapshot['search_id','%s']['search_type','twog/client?project=twog']['context','in','publish|icon|MISC']['is_current','1']['version','>','0'])" % client.get('id') snapshot = server.eval(snap_expr) if snapshot: snapshot = snapshot[0] path = server.get_path_from_snapshot(snapshot.get('code'), mode="web") img = '''''' % (login_sk, path) blue_color = '#262932'; acct_mgr_str = '%s - Email Client Services' % (acct_mgr, scheduling_email, sales_email, client_name); prod_on_call = 'Production Contact - Email Production' % (production_email, sales_email, client_name) %>
